name: Tempus
title: God of War
description: Tempus is the god of war, battle, and warriors. He is not a god of conquest or tyranny but of honorable combat, martial prowess, and the courage found on the battlefield. Tempus favors no one side in a conflict, for war is his domain regardless of who wages it. He demands that his followers fight bravely and honorably, and he despises cowardice and the wanton slaughter of noncombatants.

thresholds.benefit: Before rolling initiative, you can add 1d4 to your initiative roll.
You have advantage on the first attack roll you make in each combat.
When you score a critical hit, you can roll one additional weapon damage die.
You can enter a divine battle fury as a bonus action. For 1 minute, you have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. Usable once per long rest.
